game_description: Experience Laid-Back Camp in 3D! Together, Nadeshiko (you!) and Rin embark on a new camping adventure at Lake Motosu, taking pictures and trying lots of delicious food. About the Game Set near scenic Mt. Fuji, Nadeshiko, Rin & co. encounter a variety of unique situations. Join them in VR via your smartphone for a short adventure game (each version is about the length of an anime episode), where the fully voiced characters and vibrant scenery will make you feel like you’re really there! Cast Nadeshiko Kagamihara (Yumiri Hanamori) Rin Shima (Nao Toyama) Chiaki Ogaki (Sayuri Hara) Aoi Inuyama (Aki Toyosaki) Ena Saito (Rie Takahashi) Narration by Akio Otsuka *Voice audio is only available in Japanese. ©afro,HOUBUNSHA/Yurucamp Committee ©Gemdrops, Inc.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), Japanese, Korean
review_1: This felt like an episode from the anime from everything like the real voice actors to the narrator describing how to cook food. And it includes little details like the pine cone that makes a noise. I really hope they add in more content. As of the time of me writing this (April 4, 2021), the game $21, but feels like a polished demo. I could return the game, but I won’t as I really hope they add in more content, since as of today, this game isn’t on the official store yet.
review_2: I can appreciate the effort the devs put into this experience, that with all the cast from the anime series, this feels like a canon episode. The graphics were also made to make it close to the anime. There is not a lot you can do in this title, though, mostly just point and click with your line of sight, and the exploration around the lake lacking. A lot of the actions are just black screen with sound effects. If they allow me to pour my own drink or make the dinner step by step, it would be more enjoyable.
